text: The Board of Education may issue rules necessary for the implementation and operation of programs of education and training as may be established by the Board pursuant to § 38-912.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 31-2212.1.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-172, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 38-912.

DC CODE § 38-912.01

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Issuance of rules for programs established pursuant to § 38- 912.
